dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my goodness, can you even imagine?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my goodness, can you even imagine?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? Like, over 370,000 kids, Host_A! That's just... wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? Like, over three hundred seventy thousand kids, Host_A! That's just... wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than 370,000 Kazakh children are expected to start first grade in the new academic year, according to the Ministry of Education.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously! So many tiny humans starting school! It's, uh, it’s a huge number.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously! So many tiny humans starting school! It's, uh, it's a huge number.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And like, they've got this super long window, April to August, for enrollment. Which is, you know, smart.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And like, they've got this super long window, April to August, for enrollment. Which is, you know, smart.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The enrollment period for first grade will run from April 1 to August 31, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? But the best part, uh, is the ease of it now, like, with the eGov thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? But the best part, uh, is the ease of it now, like, with the eGov thing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, yes! The simplification, that's the real game-changer. Like, no more manually uploading all those medical certificates!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, yes! The simplification, that's the real game-changer. Like, no more manually uploading all those medical certificates!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Parents no longer need to manually upload medical certificates, as data from the "Child™s Health Passport" and "Vaccination Record" is automatically retrieved.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! It just, like, automatically pulls the data! From their health passport and vaccination record! Uh, hello convenience!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! It just, like, automatically pulls the data! From their health passport and vaccination record! Uh, hello convenience!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Parents no longer need to manually upload medical certificates, as data from the "Child™s Health Passport" and "Vaccination Record" is automatically retrieved.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! I mean, I remember having to, like, dig those out. Such a pain.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! I mean, I remember having to, like, dig those out. Such a pain.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? All that scanning, and, um, hoping it was legible. Ugh.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? All that scanning, and, um, hoping it was legible. Ugh.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And now, it's just, poof! Auto-retrieved. Incredible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And now, it's just, poof! Auto-retrieved. Incredible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And you can, like, track your application status! And even withdraw it with a click!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And you can, like, track your application status! And even withdraw it with a click!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Additionally, new features allow parents to track their application status and withdraw applications with a single click.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously! A single click! That's, uh, that's just brilliant for busy parents.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously! A single click! That's, uh, that's just brilliant for busy parents.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And a one-day processing time! One working day! That’s just, like, unheard of.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And a one-day processing time! One working day! That's just, like, unheard of.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The processing time for applications is one working day after submission.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like, you send it Monday, it’s done Tuesday. That's, uh, that's pretty wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like, you send it Monday, it's done Tuesday. That's, uh, that's pretty wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! It makes such a difference. I'm just, like, so impressed with this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! It makes such a difference. I'm just, like, so impressed with this.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Me too, honestly. Like, finally, right? Making things actually easier.
